entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
